panels.name: Renee Metivier
panels.subheading: Professional long-distance runner, entrepreneur, and all around optimist
panels.content: “My goal is to make people realize they are capable of so much more than they realize and to follow their dreams! You really can do or be anything you want to be!”

panels.name: Clara Peterson
panels.content: “I run because it’s who I am, and because it’s what I’ve always done and it’s what I always want to do.”

panels.name: Gia Alvarez
panels.subheading: Mother of twins, wife, coach, philanthropist, and marathon runner
panels.content: “Deep Breath. Long Run. Big Hug. Repeat.”

panels.name: Cammy Nelson
panels.subheading: Author, public speaker, and founder of Brave Like Me
panels.content: “I believe real, bold confidence comes from simple acts of every day bravery. It’s about taking one step at a time.”

panels.name: Amanda Napolitano
panels.subheading: Wife, mom, marathoner, race director and philanthropist
panels.content: “It is possible to change the world. To empower all women. Together. And you'd be surprised who benefits most in the end.”

panels.name: Catherine LaCour
panels.content: “Connecting and empowering girls worldwide to achieve their full economic potential by increasing opportunities for them to pursue an education is critical to achieving wide-scale gender equity around the world.”
